title: Half-Elf

High Half-Elf Wood Half-Elf Drow Half-Elf

Half-Elf is a Race in Baldur's Gate 3. Half-Elves feature Fey Ancestry and the ability to see in the dark. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their own special characteristics.

BG3 F
